# NOTES for P1Xel Editor

- colors = 16 indexed
- swatch = 1 color (from 16)
- palettes = 4 swatches
- tileset = N tiles (up to 128, 16x8)
- tile = 16x16, N palettes

## tilset.asm

Palettes:
db 0x4, 0x5, 0xA, 0xF ; Palette 0
db 0x4, 0x5, 0xB, 0x2 ; Palette 1
...

Tiles:
db 0x01 ; palettes
db 0x00 ; first palette index
dd 01010000000101010101010000000101b ; 16 pairs of bit-pair (palette index)
dd 01000000000101010101000000000001b
dd 00000001000001000100000000000000b
dd 00000101010101010000000000000000b
dd 00000101010000000100000000000100b
dd 00000001000000000000000000010001b
dd 01000101000000000000000000000101b
dd 01000001010000000000000000010001b
dd 00000001010100000001000001010101b
dd 00000101010000000000010100010101b
dd 00000101000000000001010101010101b
dd 00000101000100000100010100010100b
dd 00000101010001000001010000000000b
dd 01000001010101010101010001000001b
dd 01010000010101010101010100010101b
dd 01010100000001010101010101010101b

...

db 0xFF ; Terminator

## pixel format

dd 01010000000101010101010000000101b
=> 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01
